        Description copied from interface: DicomConfiguration
        Query for Devices with specified attributes.
        Specified by:
        listDeviceInfos in interface DicomConfiguration
        Parameters:
        keys - Device attributes which shall match or null to get information for all configured Devices
        Returns:
        array of DeviceInfo objects for configured Devices with matching attributes
